short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes any current, new, or edited Bookmarklets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prevent users from using Bookmarklet exploits. Google Workspace admins can enforce the extension to take advantage of the below features.

Features:
1. Deletes any pre-existing bookmarklets during installation
2. Deletes any newly created bookmarklet
3. Deletes any bookmarks the user tries to turn into a bookmarklet

Source Code
https://github.com/ubn2/bookmarklet-blocker

** The extension does not collect any data. **
** Warning
Use at your own risk, you can't recover any deleted bookmarklets so make sure you target the right audience. A future release will allow admins to set an allow-list of bookmarklets to keep. ***
